item.title: A simple BLOB store is comming
item.description: Hello developers in the Monaparty world. What’s “binarystore” ? We started to study for adding a binary storage to Monaparty chain. we’ll provide a way to store your binaries (the recommended size limit is about 10kB). The road to “Monaparty Automation” You will be enable to use this function just as a short storage. In addition, it will be used in upcoming “Monaparty Automation”. Message-templates and Partyscript byte-codes will be stored in the binarystore.
